languages.text: {n}Для стороннего наблюдателя то, что сейчас произошло, выглядело бы обычной схваткой, но ваши чувства... шире. Они позволяют вам ощутить хрупкую связь, что зародилась между вами в процессе кружения с клинками. Разум Кибеллы будто открылся и потянулся к вашему... познакомился с ним. Удивительная сила и устремленность для той, кто совсем не обладает псайкерскими силами. Или не ведает, что обладает ими.{/n}

{n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. It is as if Kibellah's mind has opened up, reached out to yours, and... acquainted itself with it. A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Для стороннего наблюдателя то, что сейчас произошло, выглядело бы обычной схваткой, но ваши чувства... шире. Они позволяют вам ощутить хрупкую связь, что зародилась между вами в процессе кружения с клинками. Разум Кибеллы будто открылся и потянулся к вашему... познакомился с ним. Удивительная сила и устремленность для той, кто совсем не обладает псайкерскими силами. Или не ведает, что обладает ими.{/n}

A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Für einen unbeteiligten Beobachter scheint hier ein gewöhnlicher Kampf stattgefunden zu haben, aber deine Sinne erfassen ... etwas mehr. Sie lassen dich das fragile Band wahrnehmen, das sich während dieses Klingentanzes zwischen euch gebildet hat. Es ist, als hätte sich Kibellahs Geist geöffnet, um sich deinem Verstand ... vorzustellen. Eine überraschende Machtdemonstration für jemanden, der über keinerlei psionische Fähigkeiten verfügt ... oder sich der eigenen Gabe scheinbar nicht bewusst ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. Sie lassen dich das fragile Band wahrnehmen, das sich während dieses Klingentanzes zwischen euch gebildet hat. Es ist, als hätte sich Kibellahs Geist geöffnet, um sich deinem Verstand ... vorzustellen. Eine überraschende Machtdemonstration für jemanden, der über keinerlei psionische Fähigkeiten verfügt ... oder sich der eigenen Gabe scheinbar nicht bewusst ist.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aux yeux d'un observateur extérieur, ce qui s'est produit ici pourrait passer pour un combat ordinaire, mais vos sens surdéveloppés détectent quelque chose de plus... complexe. Ils perçoivent le lien fragile qui s'est formé entre vous au cours de cette danse des lames. C'est comme si l'esprit de Kibellah s'était ouvert et tendu vers le vôtre afin d'apprendre à mieux vous connaître. Il s'agit là d'une démonstration de puissance et de maîtrise remarquable pour quelqu'un qui ne possède pas de pouvoirs psychiques... ou qui semble du moins ne pas avoir conscience du don qui est le sien.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. It is as if Kibellah's mind has opened up, reached out to yours, and... acquainted itself with it. A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aux yeux d'un observateur extérieur, ce qui s'est produit ici pourrait passer pour un combat ordinaire, mais vos sens surdéveloppés détectent quelque chose de plus... complexe. Ils perçoivent le lien fragile qui s'est formé entre vous au cours de cette danse des lames. C'est comme si l'esprit de Kibellah s'était ouvert et tendu vers le vôtre afin d'apprendre à mieux vous connaître. Il s'agit là d'une démonstration de puissance et de maîtrise remarquable pour quelqu'un qui ne possède pas de pouvoirs psychiques... ou qui semble du moins ne pas avoir conscience du don qui est le sien.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Para un observador externo, lo sucedido parecerá una pelea normal, pero tus sentidos perciben... algo más. Te permiten ver un frágil vínculo entre l{mf|o|a}s dos, formado durante esta danza de espadas. Es como si la mente de Kibellah se hubiera abierto, hubiera contactado con la tuya y la hubiera... conocido. Es una muestra sorprendente de poder y control para alguien que carece de capacidades psíquicas... o por lo menos, que permanece ignorante de su don.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. It is as if Kibellah's mind has opened up, reached out to yours, and... acquainted itself with it. A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Para un observador externo, lo sucedido parecerá una pelea normal, pero tus sentidos perciben... algo más. Te permiten ver un frágil vínculo entre l{mf|o|a}s dos, formado durante esta danza de espadas. Es como si la mente de Kibellah se hubiera abierto, hubiera contactado con la tuya y la hubiera... conocido. Es una muestra sorprendente de poder y control para alguien que carece de capacidades psíquicas... o por lo menos, que permanece ignorante de su don.{/n}

languages.text: {n}外部の監視者の目には、ここで起きたことはただの戦闘に見えただろう。だが、あなたの感覚は...それ以上の何かを掴んでいた。その感覚が、この剣舞の中で二人の間に生まれた儚い絆を感じ取らせる。それはまるでキベラの心が開かれ、あなたの心へと手を伸ばし…その心を理解したかのようだった。超能力を持たない…あるいは自身の才能に気づいていないように見える人物にしては、驚くべき能力と洞察力を見せつけている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. It is as if Kibellah's mind has opened up, reached out to yours, and... acquainted itself with it. A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}外部の監視者の目には、ここで起きたことはただの戦闘に見えただろう。だが、あなたの感覚は...それ以上の何かを掴んでいた。その感覚が、この剣舞の中で二人の間に生まれた儚い絆を感じ取らせる。それはまるでキベラの心が開かれ、あなたの心へと手を伸ばし…その心を理解したかのようだった。超能力を持たない…あるいは自身の才能に気づいていないように見える人物にしては、驚くべき能力と洞察力を見せつけている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在旁观者看来，当下发生的事情与普通的战斗无异，但你的感官却抓住了……更多的东西。在这场剑舞之中，你们两人之间形成了脆弱的纽带，就仿佛绮贝菈打开了她自己的意识，触碰到了你的意识，之后……彼此熟悉起来。对没有灵能能力的人而言，这样的力量相当令人惊讶……又或许，是绮贝菈根本没意识到自己在灵能方面的天赋。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. It is as if Kibellah's mind has opened up, reached out to yours, and... acquainted itself with it. A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在旁观者看来，当下发生的事情与普通的战斗无异，但你的感官却抓住了……更多的东西。在这场剑舞之中，你们两人之间形成了脆弱的纽带，就仿佛绮贝菈打开了她自己的意识，触碰到了你的意识，之后……彼此熟悉起来。对没有灵能能力的人而言，这样的力量相当令人惊讶……又或许，是绮贝菈根本没意识到自己在灵能方面的天赋。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dışarıdan gözlemleyen birisi için burada olup bitenler, alelade bir kavga gibi görünebilir ancak hislerin... Burada çok daha fazlasının yattığını algılıyor. Kılıç dansının tam ortasında aranızda oluşan, kırılgan bir bağı algılamanı sağlıyor. Sanki Kibellah'nın zihni, açılarak seninkine ulaşmış ve... Kendini tanıtmış gibi hissediyorsun. Hiçbir ruhsezi kabiliyetine sahip olmayan... Belki de kabiliyetinin henüz farkında olmayan birisi için şaşırtıcı bir güç gösterisi ve yönlendirmesi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}To an outside observer, what happened here would have looked like an ordinary fight, but your senses grasp... something more. They allow you to perceive a fragile bond that has formed between the two of you in the midst of this blade dance. It is as if Kibellah's mind has opened up, reached out to yours, and... acquainted itself with it. A surprising display of power and direction for someone who possesses no psychic abilities — or appears to be unaware of their own gift.{/n}
